name: 6-in-1 Board Game Club HD
description:
The Board Game Club collection containing 6 classic games including Chess, Backgammon, Checkers, Othello, Connect Four, and Ludo. Personalizing players and challenging built-in three levels of AI Players make it combines nonstop entertainment, endless replayability.


Features

* Three levels of AI players: Beginner, Expert, Master – If you are a beginner, you can choose to play with beginner, if you are already a skilled player, just try to challenge the harder level and chess with AI masters.

* Personalize your player Name & Avatar - Multiple head shape, expression, hair style, glasses, and suite for you to go with.

* Auto game statistics, winning percentage and score tracking.

* Simple game interface, easy to navigate even on the mini screen of iPhone.

* For beginners, ""highlights for available moves"" feature will help you learn the rules and make your way to an expert much faster.

* Undo function allow you to undo wrong move and avoid subsequent loss, let you play at ease.

* Save the game before quit and load it when next play.

* Local net work play via Bluetooth.
